title: 'It was just a matter of time': Authors of GWU report discuss thoughts on Capitol riot
body: George Washington University’s new report on the Capitol riot reveals that suspects that the FBI has arrested came to DC on January 6th from all over the Nation.The report also exposes that 33 of the suspects the FBI has identified come from militant networks.So this doesn’t happen again the report calls for improved access to information on domestic terrorism investigations and much more.“At the same time, there are going to be some things that are new. Like a Domestic Extremist Commission, that is going to be new and I would think folks would welcome that," says Mines.  The FBI is still trying to identify suspects from the Capitol riots,  track them down, and arrest them.     by  on Scribd
